title: Strengthening Patient Care Practical Competencies: Understanding Drainage Concepts Using the PMRI Approach: Lapindo Mud

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply the displacement calculation formula (Q=AV) to real-life problems through the Rampino mud case study.
Learners can explain changes in displacement over time by analyzing provided photo/video materials.
Learners can derive displacement values from volume-time graphs using data from scaled model experiments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
